column5: This beautiful home located in a nice and convenient community in North Plano with best schools around. You can stay here with a peaceful mind, because we have prepared everything brand new for you. You will find everything a hotel provide here, and much more! High speed wifi (ultimate fast speed up to 200 Mbps), 55 inch Smart TV(Netflix and local channels), double garage, outdoor grill, study area, etc. It is good for couples, business travellers, families (with kids), and big groups. BOOK NOW!
column8: Fully Renovated Vacation Home in North Plano
